discount-code-type.description:
`MoneyOffDiscountCode` : For a flat discount
`PercentOffDiscountCode` : For a percentage discount.

end-at.description: The time when the discount code becomes unavailable.

max-quantity-per-release.description: Discount only applies to a maxium of this number.

min-quantity-per-release.description: Discount only applies if this many tickets are selected.

only-show-attached.description: Only display tickets attached to this discount code when it is displayed or not e.g. display all publicly visible tickets. Default `false`

quantity.description: The number of tickets that can avail of this discount code.

quantity-used.description: The number of tickets this discount code has been applied to. *Readonly*.

release-ids.description: An array of the ids of `Releases` the discount code can be applied to.

reveal-secret.description: Should secret tickets be revealed if this discount code is applied or not. Default `false`

start-at.description: The time when the discount code becomes available.

value.description: The amount off per ticket. A percentage or flat amount depending on the discount code type.
